code: import React from"react";import{Parallax,ParallaxLayer}from'@react-spring/parallax';import'./component styles/Home.css';import automotiveIndustry from'../assets/images/automotive_industry.jpg';import currentPractices from'../assets/images/current_practices.jpg';import combinedSolution from'../assets/images/combined_solution.jpg';import{Grid}from'@mui/material';import WhiteCard from"./WhiteCard";import{Slide}from'react-reveal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"centered-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Parallax,{pages:2.6,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{speed:0.01,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{top:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Motivation"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{left:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{offset:0.3,speed:1,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(automotiveIndustry,")"),backgroundSize:'cover'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{bottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{direction:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"A Need in the Automotive Industry"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["There currently exists a need for a platform that provides users with the ability to perform extensive, repeatable, ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"and meaningful simulation and testing for the hardware and software which compose different systems in a modern ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"vehicle whilst being broadly accessible and widely supported. These systems can range from connected infotainment ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"systems to driving automation systems that automate lateral and longitudinal control of vehicle motion with or ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"without human supervision. Since these systems interact with an external stochastic world characterized by ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"state combinations approaching infinity, there is a need for the controlled testing and verification of ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"autonomous vehicle systems before being deployed in the real world. ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]})})})]})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{left:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{offset:0.96,speed:1,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(currentPractices,")"),backgroundSize:'cover',marginTop:225},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{bottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{direction:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Issues with Current Practices"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["The current methods of testing vehicle systems including driving automation features exhibit key weaknesses ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"in numerous areas which do not allow for the sufficient testing and validation of the software and hardware ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"components that make up these systems. Furthermore, the contemporary implementations of similar systems are ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"either financially exorbitant or highly contained."]})})})]})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{speed:0.01,offset:1.5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{bottom:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Systems to Address the Issues"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slide,{left:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParallaxLayer,{offset:1.95,speed:1,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(combinedSolution,")"),backgroundSize:'cover',marginTop:225},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{direction:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"A Combined Solution"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{direction:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WhiteCard,{marginTop:5,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["The systems that have been constructed to fill this gap in the AV development space consist of a ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"physical representation/replication of almost the entire global electrical system of a production ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"automotive platform in the form of a vehicle HIL (hardware-in-the-loop) bench and a software ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"simulation-based virtual driving HIL bench which extends on currently existing open-source software."]})})})]})})})]})});}export default Home;
